name: Brawl (itch)
description:
DESCRIPTION

A fast paced 2-player brawler game where you just have to hit your opponent once in 50+ stages! There are weapons over the map for you to hit your opponent and beware the rising water!

INCLUDES
  • Pico8 Cartridge (sourcecode)
  • Windows
  • Mac
  • Linux
  • HTML5

Made in Pico8
